Uses of Class
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ViewerColumn

Packages that use ViewerColumn
Package
Description
org.eclipse.jface.viewers
Provides a framework for viewers, which are model-based content adapters for SWT widgets.

  • Uses of ViewerColumn in org.eclipse.jface.viewers

    Subclasses of ViewerColumn in org.eclipse.jface.viewers
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    TableViewerColumn
    ViewerColumn implementation for TableViewer to enable column-specific label providers and editing support.
    final class 
    TreeViewerColumn
    ViewerColumn implementation for TreeViewer to enable column-specific label providers and editing support.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected final ViewerColumn
    StyledCellLabelProvider.getColumn()
    Returns the column on which this label provider is installed on or null if the label provider is not installed.

    This implementation of CellLabelProvider.initialize(ColumnViewer, ViewerColumn) delegates to OwnerDrawLabelProvider.initialize(ColumnViewer, ViewerColumn, boolean) with a value of true for enableOwnerDraw.
    protected final void

    May be called from subclasses that override OwnerDrawLabelProvider.initialize(ColumnViewer, ViewerColumn) but want to customize whether owner draw will be enabled.
